info.title: AzureArcDataManagementClient
info.description: The AzureArcData management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs to manage Azure Data Services on Azure Arc Resources.

availabilityGroupName.description: The name of the availability group.

availabilityGroupId.description: Id GUID of the availability group.

instanceName.description: The name of the instance name which availability group primary is on.

collectionTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the data was collected from the client machine.

version.description: SQL Server availability group current version.

dtcSupport.description: SQL Server availability group DTC support enabled.

dbFailover.description: SQL Server availability group failover for database health conditions.

clusterTypeDesc.description: SQL Server availability group cluster type description

requiredSynchronizedSecondariesCommit.description: Availability group required the number of synchronized secondary to commit.

isContained.description: SQL Server availability group contained system databases.

SqlAvailabilityGroupUpdate.description: An update to a SQL Availability Group.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

apiVersion.name: api-version
apiVersion.description: The API version to use for the request
